ValidationRule.description: Only System Administrators can update Opportunities in Closed Won stages
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'Self Service Profile' && OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Order Created'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Security Stop')) && NOT(ISCHANGED(POE_CC_Flag__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(Maps_Latitude__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(Maps_Longitude__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(POE_Sensitive_Data__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(Chuzo_CSA_Form_Data__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(Tab_Reached__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have permission to update closed opportunities
